narrative:
2.27(a) 
   
Notification of change of operation. 
Registrant moved their business to a different state and no longer operates out of their registered site. A registrant shall 
notify the Deputy Administrator by certified mail of any change in the name, address, or ownership, or other changes to 
the operations affecting its status as a carrier within 10 days of making the change.  
Notify the the Deputy Administrator of your change of address 
Correct by October 10, 2023 
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30pm-1:30pm on 
05-OCT-23. 
 
 
End Section
